title: just logged in my NA account cause both EU servers were down
body:
And I got trolled HARD by a garen who kept stealing my kills farm/ leaving his lane following me around the entire map then kept randomly afking until he left the game

this kid didn't say anthing in chat but making fun of an ally typo "labe" instead of "lane" and he apparently did what he did because i "stole" "his" champ in blind pick or whatever (only guessed he played fiora in a bot game)

I reported him, nothing will probably happen to him but you are giving yourselves A BAD REP WITH DOING THIS IMMATURE SHIT never playing on this server again
